introMessage:
Welcome to the Workspace Management Platform setup!

Let's configure your development environment step by step.

steps.instructions:
This URL is used for local development and OAuth callback URLs. 
Keep the default unless you have a custom port setup.

steps.title: ðŸ”Œ Convex Setup
steps.description: Set up your real-time backend for workspace collaboration
instructions:
1. Visit https://dashboard.convex.dev and create an account
2. Create a new project named after your workspace (e.g., 'workspace-manager')
3. In the project dashboard:
   - Go to Settings > URL & Deploy Key
   - Copy your unique deployment URL
   - Format: https://[project-id].convex.cloud
4. This URL will power your real-time data sync and authentication

steps.title: ðŸ”‘ GitHub Authentication
steps.description: Enable secure workspace access with GitHub authentication
instructions:
1. Go to https://github.com/settings/developers
2. Click 'New OAuth App'
3. Configure your application:
   - Name: Your Workspace Manager
   - Homepage URL: {{NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL}}
   - Authorization callback URL: {{convexSiteUrl}}/auth/github/callback
4. After registration:
   - Save your Client ID
   - Generate and save your Client Secret
   - These credentials will enable secure user authentication

variables.name: AUTH_GITHUB_ID
info: Use this as your authorized redirect URI: {{convexSiteUrl}}/auth/github/callback

steps.title: ðŸ’³ Polar Integration
steps.description: Configure Polar for workspace subscription handling
instructions:
1. Create your account at https://polar.sh
2. Set up your organization:
   - Click 'Sell with Polar'
   - For development: Use https://sandbox.polar.sh/dashboard/create
3. Configure your integration:
   - Organization ID: Settings > General > Organization
   - Access Token: Settings > Developers (enable all permissions)
   - Webhook: Settings > Webhooks
     â€¢ URL: {{convexSiteUrl}}/payments/webhook
     â€¢ Events: Select all subscription and payment events
     â€¢ Format: Raw
4. These settings will enable workspace subscription management

variables.name: POLAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET
info: Use this as your authorized redirect URI: {{convexSiteUrl}}/payments/webhook

additionalInstructions: Use sandbox mode for testing workspace subscription features

steps.title: ðŸ“§ Resend Email Service
steps.description: Set up Resend for workspace notifications and invites
instructions:
1. Sign up at https://resend.com
2. Configure your API access:
   - Go to API Keys
   - Create a new key (starts with 're_')
3. Set up email sending:
   - Add and verify your domain in Settings
   - Or use the sandbox domain for testing
4. This will enable:
   - Workspace invitation emails
   - Task notifications
   - Subscription updates
steps.requiredMessage: Email notifications for workspaces will be disabled until configured
